name: aswa-hugo-recipes4aj
description: I've used Hugo in the past to setup static blog sites on GitHub Pages like [this one](https://bit.ly/learn-playwright)) using the Cupper theme (as documened in [this gist](https://gist.github.com/nitya/51905082cfad7682bdf31bc8a36f5553)). But I wanted to explore using Hugo with [Azure Static Web Sites](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/) for two reasons:  * Take advantage of [built-in benefits](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/overview#key-features) like GitHub CI/CD, free SSL certifications and easy serverless integrations with Azure Functions.  * Have a static web app that I could use as a sandbox to explore other web development tools and technologies including end-to-end testing with [Playwright](https://playwright.dev) using a blogging framework I was familiar with.
